title: Course for Optimizing Learning Styles and Academic Achievement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level language learning experience and practical application skills
context.additional_context: Language education course for in-service professionals, offering project-based assessments and digital device-integrated learning environments

learning_goals: Participants can analyze their learning preferences through the Kolb Learning Style Inventory.
